attributes.action: WITH 20 YEARS OF SOCIAL ENGINEERING, HAS THIS COUNTRY BEEN LEFT WITH A CULTURELESS BENIGN SOCIETY!
attributes.additional_details:
With governments With a social Utopia of equality and multiculturalism.
Do we now have a big identity less society to be proud of. IF NO! PLEASE SIGN.

Unfortunately with the rhetoric of intervention in undermining selective parts of society and promoting others in the name of equality and positive racism.

Should Governments now be emphasizing in that people's values are individual to themselves
which has originated from Transcending Generations to be proud of your identity and traditions, instills respect for others and responsibility for society.

As human beings we make mistakes and learn by them. Let people learn!

This epetition is to stop promoting cultures, colours, genders, and backgrounds of all walks of life against others. We have laws to pretect everyone
and promoting britishness as one size fit all, its
every size fits identity. ALL DIFFERENT.
